title: Autocorrelation functions for point-process time series
summary: This article introduces autocorrelograms for time series of point processes, which often arise from slicing longer temporal or spatio-temporal point processes into smaller time units, assuming a doubly-stochastic Poisson model with log-Gaussian intensity functions.
usefulness_reason: The abstract explicitly mentions "spatio-temporal point process" and the paper focuses on autocorrelation functions for point-process time series, directly addressing the core of the search query.
